title: Fraktur Wortmarke
content:
Hi typo experts in the German area,

I need quick one or two guesses for what concerns a known firm (agency) with headquarter in Berlin  
that uses Fraktur-type as a brand (word only).  
Someone there who has an idea who could it be?

Thanks  
Stefan

 [‹ cross-platform font problem](http://web.archive.org/web/20071117073911/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38258 "Go to previous forum topic") [Downloading and Using Vista Web Fonts ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071117073911/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38272 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Stefan Seifert

comments.content:
What kind of firm? A design agency?  
Are you collecting usages, or are you looking for a special one that you can’t remember?

F

Hi Florian,

thanks for your interest.  
Seems to be a design or ad agency, don’t know.  
Another agency a week ago offered me a job (now its cancelled) and they didn’t want to reveal me the clients name.  
So I wanted to make a good figure coming up with it by myself ;-)  
So this question has been resolved anyhow..

thanks neverthess  
Stefan
